hi: Hello! How can I help you today?
hello: Hi there! What can I do for you?
who are you: I’m Soul AI, your personal assistant!
what is ai: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence — the simulation of human intelligence by machines.
what is restful apis: RESTful APIs are designed around the REST (Representational State Transfer) architecture, which uses HTTP requests to access and manipulate data. They follow a stateless, client-server, cacheable communications protocol.
